recipe_ingredients: 1 tbsp Olive oil, 1 Onion, chopped, 2 Carrots, chopped, 2 Celery stalks, chopped, 2 cloves Garlic, minced, 1 cup Brown or green lentils, rinsed, 6 cups Vegetable broth (halal), 1 tsp Cumin, 1/2 tsp Turmeric, 1/4 tsp Red pepper flakes (optional), Salt and pepper to taste, Lemon wedges, for serving
recipe_instruction: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
